ruleBookInfo.author: class.infoM@tag.dl.0@tag.dd@text
ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
url=java.getString("text.章节目录@href",src)
r=java.ajax("https://www.fanqxsw.com"+url)
n=java.getString("option@value",r)
lines = n.split('\n');
p = lines[lines.length - 1];
java.put("m",p)
java.log(p)
</js>
ruleBookInfo.name: class.book chapBox@class.txtb@tag.a.0@text
ruleBookInfo.tocUrl:
<js>
body=`{"body": "id={{baseUrl.match(/book\/(.*)\.html/)[1]}}&page=1","method": "POST"}`
if (baseUrl.match(/fanqxsw/)){	url='https://www.fanqxsw.com/index.php?action=loadChapterPage,'
	re=url +body;
	re
	}else if(baseUrl.match(/fanqxsw/)){	url='https://www.fanqxsw.com/index.php?action=loadChapterPage,'
		re=url+body;
		re
		}
	
</js>
